newsitem.title: USA: Olin shrs rise after sweeping restructuring.
newsitem.headline: Olin shrs rise after sweeping restructuring.

text.p: Shares in Olin Corp shot up to 89-3/8 from 84-1/8 in Thursday morning New York Stock Exchange trade following Olin's announcement of a broad corporate restructuring, a share buyback and a stock split.
In later market activity, Olin shares settled to trade at around 88, a 3-7/8 increase, in unusually heavy trading.
Deutsche Morgan Grenfell analyst Don Pattison, said, "I like the combination of ideas. It was better than what I was expecting."
The rally did not carry the stock near the year-high 96 hit in May. A year-low 63-3/8 was notched last November.
